casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Charles Vincent HAYES. No. 474P11-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Charles Vincent Hayes, for Hayes, Charles Vincent. Pat Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of December 2014 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
